reviews.review: 3-4 saatlik bir sürede biten şaheser diyebilirim. Oyundaki neredeyse her bulmaca gayet zevkli ve abartılı bir zorluk yok. Hikaye olarak da sadece bize anlatılanlara bağlı olmamız şüpheciliğe sokuyor. Bu şüphe ise oyna biraz karanlık ton yani korku ekliyor diyebiliriz çünkü ne olacak veya neden burdayız hiçbir bilgimiz yok. 3-4 saatlik bir oyun arıyorsanız tam sizlik.

It's a classic. In 2021, I played this game for the first time. This 14 year old game is incredibly fun, even though there are lots more games with higher quality and better physics. Honestly, the only bad part is that it's a little easy. The challenge levels definitely require you to use your brain though. Now, time to play Portal 2!

Premier jeu de la saga Portal (même si officiellement il y en a que 2 sans les mods), ce premier opus est clairement ici pour poser les bases, et quand on a fait le 2 ou même les mods de celui ci on se rend bien compte que les chambres de tests sont très facile, pas plus de 15 mins grand max pour les salles les plus difficile.

J'ai boucler l'histoire en moins de 2h en allant assez vite, bon j'avais déjà fait le jeu à l'époque sur Xbox 360 dans l'édition "Orange Box" mais la première qu'on le fait on doit y passer 4-5h environ, car on découvre les concepts, on découvre l'histoire et on prend plus le temps de se poser.

Bref, ce premier opus de Portal est là pour poser les bases, ce qui explique sa courte durée de vie mais c'est toujours un plaisir de le refaire, son successeur par contre est déjà bien plus long et apporte bien plus de contenu !

Why would you play this when Portal 2 exists? Everything this game accomplished is repeated (and done better) in the sequel. 

Others would say, “You gotta look at it from when it released,” and if I did, I guess this cool. Portals — as a gameplay mechanic — are super neat, and I know I’ve been shitting on this game, but what’s done is still super cool. It’s no wonder so many wanted a sequel. But since I played the sequel first, it only soured my impressions for this game. 

It’s kind of like Diet Portal 2 in my eyes and I HATE diets!

[h1]Portal: Cake, Puzzles, and Portals[/h1]
[b]Introduction to Portal[/b]
Portal is a puzzle game where the player must solve a series of test chambers with the best tool ever: The Portal Gun. 
Most test chambers are relatively straightforward and aren't too difficult to solve, and GLaDOS' commentary is a joy to listen to. The main game can be beaten in around 3 hours, but there are some advanced versions of certain test chambers as well as some challenge maps that will provide a good post-game challenge. 

[b]Rating: A Portal to Puzzle-Infused Fun[/b]
I'd give this game 7 Lie Cakes out of 10. Portal is a game that stands out in the puzzle genre thanks to the Portal feature that its named after, and its another Valve classic that's a cut above the rest.

Идеальный баланс хорошей графики и производительности. Весьма интересный сюжет, и просто невероятная проработка функционала портальной пушки - [u]она просто нечто[/u]. Игра из разряда тех, что не держат игрока за глупого и не водят по стрелочкам, а в некоторых случаях даже приходится попотеть, чтобы найти решение. Великолепная игра.
